con:configuration.query: select to_char(to_date(lpad(to_char(last_ddmmyy_idb),6,'0'),'ddMMyy'),'yyyy-mm-dd+hh:mm') as idd from View_ltable_Interest_debit where table_territory_code= :countryCode
